  1. # 2 "asmcomp/riscv/selection.ml"
  2. (**************************************************************************)

  14. (*                                                                        *)
  15. (**************************************************************************)

  17. (* Instruction selection for the RISC-V processor *)

  19. open Cmm
  20. open Arch
  21. open Mach

  23. (* Instruction selection *)

  25. class selector = object

  27. inherit Selectgen.selector_generic as super

  29. (* RISC-V does not support immediate operands for comparison operators *)
  30. method is_immediate_test _cmp _n = false

  32. method! is_immediate op n =
  33.   match op with
  34.   | Iadd | Iand | Ior | Ixor -> is_immediate n
  35.   (* sub immediate is turned into add immediate opposite *)
  36.   | Isub -> is_immediate (-n)
  37.   | _ -> super#is_immediate op n

  39. method select_addressing _ = function
  40.   | Cop(Cadda, [arg; Cconst_int (n, _)], _) when is_immediate n ->
  41.       (Iindexed n, arg)
  42.   | Cop(Cadda, [arg1; Cop(Caddi, [arg2; Cconst_int (n, _)], _)], dbg)
  43.     when is_immediate n ->
  44.       (Iindexed n, Cop(Caddi, [arg1; arg2], dbg))
  45.   | arg ->
  46.       (Iindexed 0, arg)

  48. method! select_operation op args dbg =
  49.   match (op, args) with
  50.   (* Recognize (neg-)mult-add and (neg-)mult-sub instructions *)
  51.   | (Caddf, [Cop(Cmulf, [arg1; arg2], _); arg3])
  52.   | (Caddf, [arg3; Cop(Cmulf, [arg1; arg2], _)]) ->
  53.       (Ispecific (Imultaddf false), [arg1; arg2; arg3])
  54.   | (Csubf, [Cop(Cmulf, [arg1; arg2], _); arg3]) ->
  55.       (Ispecific (Imultsubf false), [arg1; arg2; arg3])
  56.   | (Cnegf, [Cop(Csubf, [Cop(Cmulf, [arg1; arg2], _); arg3], _)]) ->
  57.       (Ispecific (Imultsubf true), [arg1; arg2; arg3])
  58.   | (Cnegf, [Cop(Caddf, [Cop(Cmulf, [arg1; arg2], _); arg3], _)]) ->
  59.       (Ispecific (Imultaddf true), [arg1; arg2; arg3])
  60.   | (Cstore (Word_int | Word_val as memory_chunk, Assignment), [arg1; arg2]) ->
  61.       (* Use trivial addressing mode for non-initializing stores *)
  62.       (Istore (memory_chunk, Iindexed 0, true), [arg2; arg1])
  63.   | _ ->
  64.       super#select_operation op args dbg

  66. end

  68. ‌let fundecl ~future_funcnames f =
  69.   (new selector)#emit_fundecl ~future_funcnames f
